remarks: Membership in the kernel (as shown by ~ hdmaplkr ) of the vector to dual map.  Line 17 in [Holland95] p. 14.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapellkr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapellkr.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapellkr.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapellkr.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapellkr.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapellkr.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
hdmapellkr.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapellkr.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapellkr.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmapellkr.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmapellkr $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( S ` X ) ` Y ) = .0. <-> Y e. ( O ` { X } ) ) ) $.
